config.templatesPath.desc: Path to a custom commit message template file (optional).
config.autoStageAllForDiff.desc: Only when the staging area is empty: temporarily stage all changes to build the diff, then restore your staging state. Use with cautionâ€”this may include unrelated changes in the prompt.
config.chain.enabled.desc: Enable multi-step chain prompting for commit generation (It makes the generated commit messages more detailed and accurate, and better aligns with the user's template, but it will increase latency and token consumption).
config.chain.maxParallelNew.desc: Maximum parallel LLM calls used by chain prompting across all providers. Increase carefully to avoid provider rate limits.
config.gemini.rpmLimit.desc: Gemini soft Requests-Per-Minute limit used by local throttling. Tip: For free tier keep <= 8 (official ~10 RPM) to avoid 429; increase for higher tiers.
config.gemini.tpmLimit.desc: Gemini soft Tokens-Per-Minute limit used by local throttling. Tip: Free tier stay <= 200k (official ~250k TPM); raise after upgrading.
config.gemini.expectedTokensPerCall.desc: Estimated tokens per request for pre-allocation in TPM budgeting. Increase if diffs/templates are large; decrease or lower concurrency if you hit 429s often.
